attributes.action: ban magazines from unwanted circular junk mail invitations being placed between the pages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How annoying is it to open your favourite magazine when ever other page you turn rewards you with another book club/DVD club free something, that you really don't want, type of offer, falling into your lap.
These additional invitations should be banned from all future sales of magazines. 
Can I ask His Toniness to put a halt to this once and for all it is nothing but a waste of paper. A subversive attempt to entice the innocent into a junk mail nirvana.
